snippet.description:
You Should Subscribe Here Now: http://bit.ly/VErZkw
Kool A.D. (formerly of Das Racist) and Kassa Overall have teamed up to release the mixtape KOOL & KASS: PEACEFUL SOLUTIONS, a "Syncretic supersoul that harnesses the magnimity of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans," according to the artists. Here's the video for lead single, "Pleasance (WDGAF)." 

Stream/Embed - http://soundcloud.com/koolandkass/pleasance
Download - http://koolandkass.bandcamp.com/track/pleasance-wdgaf-prod-carlos-overall

KOOL & KASS: PEACEFUL SOLUTIONS 
Download the full tape here!: http://koolandkass.bandcamp.com

Directed by: ESNAF  (http://www.esnaf.me)
Director of Photography: Rob Leitzell
Art Director: Olga Miasnikova
Editor: Milena Z. Petrovic
Colorist: Jure Terzan / Teleking / www.telekiing.si
Additional Actors: TECLA, Hallie Cooper-­‐Novack, Tijana Masic
Producers: Andrew Briggie & Melissa Currier / EV2BK - www.ev2bk.com
Special thanks to: Goran Šćepanović, Andrej Pralica, Zaga Skerletović
Production house: More Media, EMOTE Productions & EV2BK Productions
2013

KOOL & KASS: PEACEFUL SOLUTIONS Mixtape Release Party will be be at Glasslands Gallery in Brooklyn, NY on 4/30 opening for TECLA, who is featured in the video as an actor.  


Get tickets here!
http://www.theglasslands.com/event/252317-tecla-brooklyn/
http://www.ticketfly.com/purchase/event/252317?wrKey=52352AF594184E9ED25BB942E820F7BA

Thanks!
http://koolandkass.bandcamp.com
http://soundcloud.com/koolandkass
http://koolad.asia
http://kassaoverall.com
http://twitter.com/veeveeveeveevee
http://twitter.com/kassaoverall
http://facebook.com/kassoverallmusic

**
Subscribe to Noisey on YouTube to stay updated on our daily releases: http://www.youtube.com/noisey
Videos, daily editorial and more: http://www.noisey.com
Like Noisey on Facebook: http://fb.com/noisey
Follow Noisey on Twitter: http://twitter.com/noiseymusic
Read our tumblr: http://noiseymusic.tumblr.com
snippet.title: Kool & Kass - "Pleasance (WDGAF)" (Official Video)
